title: Top Places to visit in Makhdumpur, Bihar
content:
Makhdumpur is a town and notified area in the Indian state of Bihar.
 
Demographics

title: Top Places to visit in Mahnar Bazar, Bihar
content: Mahnar Bazar is a municipality, block, and Sub-division in the Vaishali district of Bihar state in India. It is also the main market for all nearby ward areas and villages. title: Top Places to visit in Lalganj, Bihar
content: Lalganj is a town with Nagar panchayat in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is developing rapidly due to the Rail Coach Factory. Lalganj has the largest railway station in Raebareli district. It is located on the way from Kanpur to Raebareli/Allahabad and Lucknow to Fatehpur. Lalganj is locat

title: Top Places to visit in Forbesganj, Bihar
content:
Forbesganj is a city with a municipality in the Araria District (formerly Purnia District before 1992) in the state of Bihar, India, situated at the border of Nepal.

title: Top Places to visit in Dumraon, Bihar
content: Dumraon is a subdivision in Buxar district in the Indian state of Bihar. Dumraon is one of Bihar's oldest municipalities and one of India's oldest princely states also known as Dumraon Raj. Top Places to visit in Barauli, Bihar
content:
Barauli is a town and a notified area in the Gopalganj district in the state of Bihar, India.
 
Geography
Barauli is located at 26.4°N 84.58°E. It has an average elevation of 65 meters (213 feet).

Top Places to visit in Silapathar, Assam
content: Silapathar is a city in Dhemaji district in the Indian state of Assam. The city is situated on the northern bank of the Brahmaputra River and is located 470 kilometres from the city of Guwahati and just 6 km from the border of Arunachal Pradesh. title: Top Places to visit in Rangiya, Assam
content: Rangiya or Rangia is a town and a municipal board in Kamrup rural district in the Indian state of Assam. It is the regional divisional headquarters of the North East Frontier Railway. It's situated 52 kilometres away from the state headquarters Dispur Guwahati and 39 kilometres from Jalukbari.</p
